title: 3DCP.data: A database framework for 3D concrete printing
description: This record contains the templates, libraries, and setup information for the 3DCP.data database framework, developed at Eindhoven University of Technology (TU/e). The framework enables structured collection and storage of experimental data from 3D concrete printing processes. It includes material and system component libraries, templates for constructing data records, and software packages to support data processing and analysis. This record is intended to help the community access, share, and reuse 3D concrete printing data in a standardized format.
